title: How have hair salons changed over the years?

korean: 미용실이 예전이랑 많이 달라진 것 같아요.
어렸을 때는 동네 이발소 가면 아저씨들만 계셨거든요.
그냥 짧게 깎는 정도였고 스타일 같은 건 별로 신경 안 쓰고.
지금은 남자들도 미용실 가는 게 당연해졌어요.
헤어 디자이너라고 부르고 상담도 제대로 하고.
펌, 염색은 기본이고 클리닉 같은 것도 많이 하죠.
예약 시스템도 다 앱으로 하고 포인트 적립도 되고.
가격은 많이 올랐지만 서비스는 확실히 좋아졌어요.
1인 미용실도 많아져서 좀 더 개인화된 서비스를 받을 수 있고.
전반적으로 미용실 문화가 고급화된 것 같아요.
english: Hair salons have changed a lot from the past, I think.
When I was young, if you went to the neighborhood barbershop, there were only older men.
They just cut it short and didn't really care about style.
Now it's natural for men to go to hair salons too.
They're called hair designers and they do proper consultations.
Perms and dyeing are basic, and they do lots of treatments too.
The interior has changed to be super stylish too.
Like a cafe atmosphere with music playing.
The reservation system is all done through apps and you can earn points.
The prices have gone up a lot, but the service has definitely improved.
There are more one-person salons too, so you can get more personalized service.
Overall, I think the hair salon culture has become more upscale, you know.
